ygData.subject: Shadow destiny's crew

(Tankor, if you dont want me to say your chars followed, just tell me)

Belthassan arrived on the command room. The spacious room was fitted with a 
command chair in the back, a holo table in the center and several chairs 
pointing to a huge holo-projection wall. Melchana and Gesper were working on 
some adjustments on Prophecy, the main computer when the new rookies 
arrived.

Belthassan:
Welcome to the command room. Let me present you Melchana, my sister and the 
armament specialist, and Gesper, my brother and the strategic and tactical 
planning officer. Prophets, these are Tankor, Jetstorm, Thrust and Obsidean.

Melchana:
So, you are the recruits, right? As Bel said, I'm Melchana, and as soon as 
he reformats you, I'll be the one who trains you. (Her tone was that of a 
harsh, battle-hardened officer.) As techno-organics, we have to learn 
everything again, from transformation to battle. And let me tell you that I 
am not as sweet as my brother.

Belthassan:
Also, another Tripredacus is here on Earth. His name is Daemos. He is one of 
my old friend and the co-commander, alongside with me, of our mission. Any 
questions?
